metadata.description: Ready for dinner at Olive Garden? üçù Explore the 2025 dinner menu, with prices on every entr√©e from Chicken Alfredo to Lasagna. Plan your feast! üëá

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: Dinner at Olive Garden is an EVENT. We're talking unlimited breadsticks, that famous salad, and plates of pasta that feel like a warm hug. ü§ó The star of the show is often the legendary Chicken Alfredo‚Äîit's creamy, it's dreamy, and it's everything you want in a comfort food classic. Let's explore all the amazing entrees on the 2025 dinner menu! üî•

CLASSIC ENTR√âES.description: These are the icons! The timeless Italian-American dishes that made Olive Garden a legend. You can't go wrong here. üèÜ

items.name: Chicken Alfredo
items.review: The GOAT. The legend. The creamiest, most decadent Alfredo sauce you'll ever taste. It's famous for a reason. An absolute must-try. üíØ

items.name: Chicken Parmigiana
items.review: Crispy chicken, melted cheese, and a mountain of spaghetti. What's not to love? It's a classic for a reason. So satisfying! ü§å

items.name: Lasagna Classico
items.review: This is the real deal, folks! Layers of pasta, savory meat sauce, and so much cheese. It's like a warm hug on a plate. üçù If you want a taste of classic Olive Garden, this is IT. 10/10 comfort food.

items.name: Create Your Own Pasta ‚Äì Cucina Mia!

AMAZING ALFREDOS.description: Get ready to indulge! This is the rich, creamy, house-made Alfredo sauce you dream about. ü§§

items.name: Chicken Alfredo
items.review: The creamiest, dreamiest Alfredo sauce you'll ever have. The grilled chicken is tender and the fettuccine is cooked perfectly. It's rich, it's decadent, and it's worth every single calorie. ü§§

SIDES & SAUCES.description: Need a little extra? Add one of our delicious sides or grab a tub of our famous sauce to-go!

items.name: Side of Five Cheese Marinara Sauce (Large)

items.question: Can I get lunch-sized portions for dinner?
items.answer: Usually, the lunch-sized portions are a weekday, pre-3 PM deal. But hey, it never hurts to ask your server nicely! Some locations might be cool about it. üòâ

items.question: What are the best gluten-free dinner options?
items.answer: You've got options! Olive Garden offers gluten-free rotini pasta you can get with marinara or meat sauce. Plus, they can modify other dishes. Just let your server know you're eating gluten-free!

items.question: Does Olive Garden have family dinners?
items.answer: YES! They have awesome Family-Style Meals that serve 4-6 people. You can get giant trays of Chicken Alfredo, Lasagna, and more. It's perfect for a night in with the whole crew. üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶

items.question: Can I customize my meal at Olive Garden?
items.answer: Absolutely! Olive Garden allows guests to customize their meals. For example, you can request to adjust ingredients to suit your taste, like swapping a sauce or adding extra toppings.

items.question: What are some popular items on the Olive Garden menu?
items.answer: Some guest favorites from the menu include Fettuccine Alfredo, Chicken Parmigiana, Lasagna Classico, and the Tour of Italy. The Unlimited Soup, Salad, and Breadsticks combo is also a legendary choice!

items.question: Are there any secret menu items?
items.answer: While Olive Garden doesn‚Äôt have an official secret menu, fans have shared tips like swapping marinara sauce for marsala sauce on the Eggplant Parmigiana or requesting extra salad dressing for dipping breadsticks. Get creative!

items.question: What is the best family meal at Olive Garden?
items.answer: The Family-Style Lasagna Bundle ($66.99, 6,700 calories) is a top pick for feeding a group. It serves 4-6 people and comes with a jumbo house salad and 12 breadsticks. It's a guaranteed crowd-pleaser!
